text: The Maguse River is located in the Kivalliq Region of northern Canada's territory of Nunavut. It originates at Maguse Lake and flows eastward to northwestern Hudson Bay. At one time, there was a trading post at the mouth of the river. ==See also== *List of rivers of Nunavut ==References== Category:Rivers of Kivalliq Region Category:Tributaries of Hudson Bay
title: Maguse River
